description: Comprehensive Elasticsearch monitoring dashboard using OpenTelemetry Collector metrics. Covers node health, cluster status, index performance, and search/query performance.
name: elasticsearch
title: Elasticsearch Monitoring Dashboard

984da0a3-2817-41df-ae63-8dab5bcaa61a.name: deployment.environment
984da0a3-2817-41df-ae63-8dab5bcaa61a.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'deployment.environment') AS `deployment.environment`
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'elasticsearch.node.operations.completed'
AND unix_milli >= {{.start_timestamp}}
AND unix_milli < {{.end_timestamp}}
GROUP BY `deployment.environment`
ORDER BY `deployment.environment` ASC

widgets.description: Rate of time spent on operations per node, indicating CPU load

widgets.title: Node JVM Heap Usage

widgets.title: Cluster Shards by State

widgets.description: Number of shards currently relocating in the cluster
widgets.title: Relocating Shards

widgets.description: Number of pending tasks in the cluster queue
widgets.title: Cluster Pending Tasks

widgets.description: Rate of index operations completed per second per node
widgets.title: Indexing Rate

widgets.description: Rate of completed operations per index
widgets.title: Index Operations Rate

widgets.description: Total number of documents stored per node
widgets.title: Documents Count

widgets.description: Rate of refresh and flush operations per node
widgets.title: Refresh & Flush Rate

widgets.description: Rate of search operations completed per second per node
widgets.title: Search Rate

widgets.description: Average search latency in milliseconds per operation (time / completed)
widgets.title: Search Latency (avg ms/op)

widgets.description: Memory used by the query cache per node
widgets.title: Query Cache Memory Usage

widgets.description: Rate of get/fetch operations completed per second per node
widgets.title: Fetch Rate
